content.prompt: The system of indentured labor used during the Colonial period had which of the following effects?

choices.label: It enabled England to deport most criminals.
It enabled poor people to seek opportunity in America.
It delayed the establishment of slavery in the South until about 1750.
It facilitated the cultivation of cotton in the South.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
